title: Dave: Demolitions Expert/Dave: New Angeles Most Wanted
text:
When your turn ends, if you've made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn, flip this identity and trash all installed Corp and Runner cards.

Flip side:
Dave: New Angeles Most Wanted
Identity: Felon

...the harder they fall"
flavor: "The bigger they are...Flip side:...the harder they fall"
stripped_title: Dave: Demolitions Expert/Dave: New Angeles Most Wanted
